acceptReview(uint256).details: Accepts a review and pays out a portion of the bounty - only the paper author can do this

createBounty(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Creates a bounty for a paper to incentivize reviews - only the paper author can do this

params.maxReviewers: Maximum number of reviewers who can receive the bounty

getAcceptedReviews(uint256).details: Gets all accepted reviews for a paper

returns._0: reviewIds Array of accepted review IDs for the paper

getBountyStatus(uint256).details: Returns the bounty status for a paper

returns.isActive: Whether the bounty is still active
returns.timeRemaining: Time remaining until the deadline (in seconds)

getReview(uint256).details: Gets review details by review ID

returns._0: Review struct containing the review details

getReviewsByPaper(uint256).details: Gets all reviews for a paper

returns._0: reviewIds Array of review IDs for the paper

getReviewsByReviewer(address).details: Gets all reviews by a reviewer

returns._0: reviewIds Array of review IDs by the reviewer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

reclaimBounty(uint256).details: Reclaim remaining bounty after deadline has passed - only the bounty creator can do this

rejectReview(uint256).details: Rejects a review - only the paper author can do this

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

submitReview(uint256,string).details: Submits a review for a paper

params.ipfsHash: IPFS hash of the review content

returns._0: reviewId The ID of the newly created review

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateCoreAddress(address).details: Updates the SageNetCore contract address (for upgrades)

params._newCoreAddress: The new address of the SageNetCore contract
